text: Hi Everyone - I've stepped in for another developer and I'm trying to determine if the theme they're using is a cloned theme or a child theme so I can do an upgrade.  Is there an easy way to determine the difference?
In a child theme, you will see a CSS and JS file at the top level of the theme.
Thank you for your response <@U064LSX4L9K> :slightly_smiling_face: .  This must be a clone.
